ygData.subject: Jared: Why you have to be that way??
ygData.msgSnippet: I never have understood flames like this one from Jared. It seems to me that if you can t refrain from calling somebody a retard (doesn t really show much
ygData.messageBody:
I never have understood flames like this one from Jared.
It seems to me that if you can't refrain from calling somebody a "retard"
(doesn't really show much intellectual creativity with regards to YOUR
vocabulary to use this rather childish word, IMHO ;), I believe it would be
in the best interest of all of the people on the List if you just didn't
respond with flames like that.
On the other hand, I too find it irritating that people respond to questions
with guesses and third hand information that they pass along as fact.
Please don't respond to questions on this list with rumors and unconfirmed
information.

Pardon my rambling...here's MY question:

Does anybody know what faction (amiable, warmly, etc) that you need with the
Halas merchants to perform the Langseax quests???
I spent about 3 hours running around Black Burrow the last couple of days,
killing anything that moved. It seems like one out of about 10 gnolls drops
a Gnoll Tooth (fang??). I've collected 38 of them...killed maybe 300 - 400
gnolls. Tedious...VERY tedious.
Anyway...I was going to try the Langseax quest next time I can get together
with my Druid friend (for tracking and SoW...heard this is useful for
following the dog during the quest)...but I was hoping somebody could give
me an idea of what faction will work so I'm not wasting (any more) time.
Thanks!
Sean

Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Dark Reaver


From: "Jared Hughes" <jaredh@...>

sure ok
a quest for an item they can't even equip, you retard
ghoul cavalier in exe room drops adamantium epolets common, and dark reaver
rare

Veldra Rae`lynn
lvl 42 magician
Veeshan
